english.segment1: You turned my way. You heard my cry. You turned my mourning into shouting. Sorrow may last for a night. But with the light I am seeing. I am singing
english.segment2: You lifted me out. You lifted me out. And set me dancing, dancing. Free, now I am free. Your love rescued me. Now it's the anthem I'm singing
english.segment3: Many will see. Many will hear. And find You strong enough to save. Many the wonders You have done. Your light has come, I am singing. I am singing
english.segment4: Lost is where You found me. Shattered and frail. But You love me still. Trouble may surround me. My heart may fail. But You never will. You never will
